name: Golden Tulip Troyes

reviews.title: Convenient for Travellers
reviews.text: This is a typical Novotel. Fine for an overnight stay. Seemed to be popular with conferences.

reviews.title: A disappointment
reviews.text: Nice restaurant - and pleasant service. Breakfast was plentiful and well presented. Breakfast was provided as part of our room rate.

reviews.title: Friendly - Careful with Access
reviews.text: Rooms are starting to be dated. Smoking and non-smoking rooms freely intermixed - and smoking in the lobby was annoying.

description: The Golden Tulip Troyes is located 10 minutes away from the popular factory outlet centre and close to the city centre. This 4 star hotel is an ideal place to stay on a business or a leisure trip to Troyes. The hotel offers 83 airconditioned rooms, a restaurant with a terrace alongside the swimming pool, a bar open until midnight and five meeting rooms for your seminars and training days.
